product_name: Mountain Hardwear CoolRunner Shorts - Men's 7" Inseam
long_description: Rigorously tested by serious trail runners, the Mountain Hardwear CoolRunner Shorts keep you cool during hot weather with an enhanced moisture-wicking fabric that creates a cooling sensation. Fabric uses a technology called Cool.Q?? ZERO to enhance the process of moisture wicking and create a continuous cooling sensation during the run. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking fabric moves moisture away from your skin; open-knit mesh structure allows maximum airflow while a special fabric treatment fights odors. Fabric features a durable water repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off. Fabric protects skin from harmful UV light with a UPF rating of 30. Soft drawcord at waist ensures a comfortable fit. Zip security pocket at back stores a key or other small items. The Mountain Hardwear CoolRunner Shorts are semifitted.
